page.title: 12Politics
page.content: We interviewed a local councillor,her name is Miss Jenny Kemp.She has been a councillor for many years, Lord Mayor and is also a governor of our school.She told us there are about 12,000 people in each local area known as a ward.There are three councillors who look after each ward.It is hard work but she enjoys it.She gets paid Â£16 for every meeting she attends. The main problems in the area are unemployment, falling trade and poor housing.The councillors are trying to have the building of high-rise flats stopped and grants made available to improve housing.Many local amenities have closed due to the lack of money ie.libraries and clinics.Her most significant role as councillor was assisting in the creation of Crosby Marina and opposing the extension of the docks.
